skills.name: POUNCE
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance for each ally to Increase ATK for 1 turn.

skills.name: HOWL
desc: • Heal amount is based on your ATK.
• Lifesteal heals you for 60% of the physical damage you deal.

skills.name: REPEAL
desc: • Grants Immunity to all allies for 1 turn at the start of the battle.
• Grants immunity to a random ally every following turn..
